entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Controlling ImplicitUsings based on PackageReference #21996
  • Update to .NET 6 RC 2, then workloads are not able to GC #21983
  • `dotnet test --arch X64` doesn't fail on Mac arm64 #21980
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 2, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 2 #sdk-113518-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC2 #21964

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #21993
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.1xx #21992
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #21991
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #21990
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • Fix ConcatenateCssFiles when used with Razor class libraries #21982
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.1xx
  • [ASP.NET] Tidy up messages in GenerateStaticWebAssetsDevelopmentManifest #21974
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21971
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [Release/6.0.1xx] Build Microsoft.DotNet.Compatilibity in source-build #21978
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Use NuGetPackageVersion in dotnet.*.js file name #21919
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21885
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding `DotNetWatchBuild` variable to the msbuild initiated by dotnet-watch #21722
    Area-Watch
